name: The Crystal Cavern (AtomicalSloths, GavynM, shadowness13, FadedAwakening)
name_original: The Crystal Cavern (AtomicalSloths, GavynM, shadowness13, FadedAwakening)
description:
An Alien has crash-landed in a cave. Its spaceship must be nearby, you need to find it and get out of here. You'll also need to collect emeralds to fuel your ship.  A challenging platform that should take about 5 minutes to complete. Hope you enjoy it!

This was created for the My First Game Jam Summer 2021. Theme: Free
